metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2050 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.x before 6.0.2 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of users for requests that reset passwords via a crafted HTTP Host header.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
